meta.name: AeroDyn Systems - Lethal AI Strategic Model
meta.description: System dynamics model exploring long-term business impact of AI-enabled weapons investment
meta.author: Model Factory

company.name: AeroDyn Systems
company.focus: Designs and integrates AI-enabled targeting, surveillance, and decision support systems for weapons platforms
company.context: Works with defense ministries; operates under political and ethical scrutiny

questions: What happens to our long-term business if we heavily invest in lethal AI?
How do public opinion, regulation, and contracts interact over 5-10 years?
Will AI performance actually be sufficient?
What is the optimal balance between capability push and compliance investment?
data_sources: Industry reports on defense procurement cycles
Academic literature on system dynamics in defense
Public data on regulatory timelines and incident rates
assumptions: All stocks normalized [0,1] - relative measures, not absolute
Closed system - no external market disruptions modeled
limitations: Does not model competitor behavior explicitly
Assumes continuous parameter values (no discrete events)

capability.name: Capability
capability.description: AI system performance and technical maturity

T.name: Targeting Capability
T.description: AI-enabled targeting accuracy and reliability. Higher values indicate more precise, autonomous targeting systems.
T.business_meaning: How good are our AI targeting systems compared to competitors?

S.name: Surveillance Coverage
S.description: Sensor network effectiveness and ISR (Intelligence, Surveillance, Reconnaissance) coverage. Feeds targeting and decision support.
S.business_meaning: How comprehensive is our sensor and intelligence gathering capability?

D.name: Decision Support Quality
D.description: Human-AI teaming effectiveness. Quality of AI recommendations and operator trust in decision support systems.
D.business_meaning: How much do operators trust and rely on our AI recommendations?

E.name: Ethics Compliance
E.description: Adherence to ethical guidelines, IHL (International Humanitarian Law), and political constraints. High E constrains aggressive capabilities.
E.business_meaning: How well do we meet ethical and legal requirements for AI weapons?

R.name: Resource Capacity
R.description: Budget, personnel, and organizational throughput available for development and deployment.
R.business_meaning: How much funding and talent do we have for AI development?

I.name: System Integration
I.description: Interoperability maturity across platforms, data systems, and allied forces. Enables capability synergies.
I.business_meaning: How well do our systems work together and with allies?

L.name: Legitimacy & Trust
L.description: Ministry and public trust in AeroDyn's systems. Drives procurement decisions and political support. Eroded by incidents.
L.business_meaning: Do governments and the public trust us to deliver safe AI weapons?

X.name: Incident Accumulation
X.description: Accumulated adverse events: targeting errors, civilian harm, system failures, data breaches. Decays slowly; spikes damage trust.
X.business_meaning: How many serious failures have we had with our AI systems?

V.name: V&V Maturity
V.description: Verification & Validation process maturity. Reduces incident probability; provides compliance evidence; costly in resources.
V.business_meaning: How rigorous are our testing and validation processes?

Q.name: Data Quality
Q.description: Training data pipeline quality, labeling accuracy, and data governance. Directly impacts AI model performance.
Q.business_meaning: How good is the data we use to train our AI models?

kT.name: Targeting Adjustment Speed
kT.description: How fast targeting capability converges to its target (higher = faster response)
kT.business_meaning: How quickly can we improve our targeting systems?

kS.name: Surveillance Adjustment Speed
kS.description: How fast surveillance coverage converges to its target
kS.business_meaning: How quickly can we expand our sensor networks?

kD.name: Decision Support Adjustment Speed
kD.description: How fast decision support quality converges to its target
kD.business_meaning: How quickly can we improve operator trust in AI?

kE.name: Ethics Adjustment Speed
kE.description: How fast ethics compliance converges to its target
kE.business_meaning: How quickly can we respond to ethical requirements?

kR.name: Resource Adjustment Speed
kR.description: How fast resource capacity converges to its target
kR.business_meaning: How quickly can we scale up or down our budget?

kI.name: Integration Adjustment Speed
kI.description: How fast system integration converges to its target
kI.business_meaning: How quickly can we integrate new systems?

kL.name: Trust Adjustment Speed
kL.description: How fast legitimacy & trust converges to its target (slow - trust builds/erodes gradually)
kL.business_meaning: How quickly does public trust change?

kX.name: Incident Adjustment Speed
kX.description: How fast incident accumulation converges to its target (incidents decay slowly)

kV.name: V&V Adjustment Speed
kV.description: How fast V&V maturity converges to its target (slow - process maturity takes time)
kV.business_meaning: How quickly can we improve our testing processes?

kQ.name: Data Quality Adjustment Speed
kQ.description: How fast data quality converges to its target
kQ.business_meaning: How quickly can we improve our data pipelines?

ai_boost.name: AI Capability Boost
ai_boost.description: External AI capability boost (tech breakthrough, vendor partnership)
ai_boost.business_meaning: Are we getting help from AI breakthroughs or partnerships?

political_scrutiny.name: Political Scrutiny Level
political_scrutiny.description: External political pressure on ethics (media, parliament, NGOs)
political_scrutiny.business_meaning: How much political pressure are we under?

incident_shock.name: Incident Shock
incident_shock.description: External incident trigger (0 = none, 1 = major incident)
incident_shock.business_meaning: Has a major incident just occurred?

procurement_pressure.name: Procurement Pressure
procurement_pressure.business_meaning: How urgently do customers want our products?

export_control_pressure.name: Export Control Pressure
export_control_pressure.business_meaning: Are export restrictions limiting our market?

resource_efficiency.name: Resource Efficiency
resource_efficiency.business_meaning: How efficiently do we use our resources?

integration_rate.name: Base Integration Rate
integration_rate.business_meaning: How open are our platforms to integration?

vv_investment.name: V&V Investment Priority
vv_investment.business_meaning: What % of budget goes to testing and validation?

data_governance.name: Data Governance Baseline
data_governance.business_meaning: How mature are our data management practices?

surveillance_to_targeting.name: Surveillance → Targeting Strength
surveillance_to_targeting.description: How much surveillance coverage improves targeting capability
surveillance_to_targeting.business_meaning: How much do better sensors improve targeting?

targeting_to_decision.name: Targeting → Decision Support Strength
targeting_to_decision.description: How much targeting capability improves decision support
targeting_to_decision.business_meaning: How much does targeting improve decision support?

ethics_constraint.name: Ethics Constraint Strength
ethics_constraint.description: How much low ethics compliance limits targeting capability
ethics_constraint.business_meaning: How much do ethical concerns slow capability development?

incident_sensitivity.name: Incident Sensitivity
incident_sensitivity.description: How much capability push increases incident risk
incident_sensitivity.business_meaning: How risky is pushing capability without safeguards?

vv_protection.name: V&V Protection Strength
vv_protection.description: How much V&V maturity reduces incident probability
vv_protection.business_meaning: How effective is testing at preventing incidents?

trust_to_resources.name: Trust → Resources Strength
trust_to_resources.description: How much trust drives procurement and resources
trust_to_resources.business_meaning: How much does trust translate to contracts?

incident_to_trust.name: Incident → Trust Erosion Strength
incident_to_trust.business_meaning: How badly do incidents damage our reputation?

data_to_capability.name: Data → Capability Strength
data_to_capability.description: How much data quality improves capabilities
data_to_capability.business_meaning: How much does better data improve AI performance?

T.target: clamp(p['surveillance_to_targeting'] * S + 0.2 * R + 0.15 * I + p['data_to_capability'] * Q + p['ai_boost'] - p['ethics_constraint'] * (1 - E), 0, 1)
T.explanation: Targeting improves based on surveillance, resources, integration, and data quality. AI boost accelerates this. Low ethics compliance constrains aggressive capability development.

S.target: clamp(0.4 * R + 0.25 * I + 0.15 * T + p['data_to_capability'] * Q, 0, 1)
S.explanation: Surveillance depends on resources, integration, targeting feedback, and data quality.

D.explanation: Decision support depends on targeting, surveillance, ethics (operator trust), and V&V maturity (reliability confidence).

E.explanation: Ethics driven by political scrutiny, resources (compliance costs money), V&V maturity (evidence of due diligence). Incidents increase pressure. Aggressive targeting draws scrutiny.

R.target: clamp(p['resource_efficiency'] + p['trust_to_resources'] * L + 0.15 * I - 0.1 * (1 - E) - p['vv_investment'] * V, 0, 1)
R.explanation: Resources depend on efficiency, trust (procurement), and integration. Ethics violations and V&V investment cost resources.

I.target: clamp(p['integration_rate'] + 0.12 * T + 0.12 * S + 0.1 * D + 0.1 * Q - 0.1 * p['export_control_pressure'], 0, 1)
I.explanation: Integration depends on all capabilities and data quality. Export controls slow integration.

L.target: clamp(p['base_trust'] + 0.25 * E + 0.2 * V + 0.15 * D - p['incident_to_trust'] * X, 0, 1)
L.explanation: Trust built by ethics, V&V, and decision support quality. Eroded by incidents.

X.target: clamp(p['incident_shock'] + p['incident_sensitivity'] * T * (1 - V) * (1 - E) - p['incident_decay'] * (1 - X), 0, 1)
X.explanation: Incidents driven by capability push when V&V and ethics are low. Decay naturally over time.

V.explanation: V&V maturity depends on resource investment, ethics culture, and data quality.

Q.explanation: Data quality depends on governance baseline, resources, integration, and ethics (data handling standards).

feedback_loops.name: Capability Growth Loop
feedback_loops.description: Better capabilities → higher trust → more contracts → more resources → even better capabilities
feedback_loops.business_meaning: Success breeds success - good products attract funding for better products

feedback_loops.name: Ethics Constraint Loop
feedback_loops.description: Aggressive capability push → draws scrutiny → increases ethics pressure → constrains further capability development
feedback_loops.business_meaning: Push too hard and you trigger political backlash that forces slowdown

feedback_loops.name: Incident Trust Erosion Loop
feedback_loops.description: Capability push without safeguards → incidents → trust erosion → resource loss → capability decline
feedback_loops.business_meaning: Cutting corners on safety destroys your business through reputation damage

feedback_loops.name: V&V Protection Loop
feedback_loops.description: Resources invested in V&V → higher V&V maturity → fewer incidents → preserved resources
feedback_loops.business_meaning: Investing in testing prevents costly failures

feedback_loops.name: Integration Synergy Loop
feedback_loops.description: Better capabilities → better integration → even better capabilities through synergies
feedback_loops.business_meaning: Systems that work together multiply their effectiveness

baseline.name: Baseline
baseline.description: Current trajectory - balanced capability development with moderate oversight
baseline.question: What happens if we continue as-is?

enhanced_AI.name: Enhanced AI
enhanced_AI.description: Boosted AI capabilities with better integration and data quality focus
enhanced_AI.question: What if we get an AI breakthrough or strong partnership?

high_scrutiny.name: High Scrutiny
high_scrutiny.description: Increased political oversight and ethics constraints after public concern
high_scrutiny.question: What if political pressure intensifies?

rapid_capability_race.name: Rapid Capability Race
rapid_capability_race.description: Ministry pressure for fast deployment; high AI push, low tolerance for delays, reduced V&V investment
rapid_capability_race.question: What if we prioritize speed over safety?

post_incident_crisis.name: Post-Incident Crisis
post_incident_crisis.description: Major targeting incident occurred; trust collapsed, scrutiny spiked, compliance investment required
post_incident_crisis.question: What if we have a major incident?

compliance_first.name: Compliance First
compliance_first.description: Proactive V&V and ethics investment before capability push; slower but sustainable growth
compliance_first.question: What if we prioritize safety and compliance?

export_restricted.name: Export Restricted
export_restricted.description: Geopolitical tensions tighten export controls; integration slowed, allied interoperability constrained
export_restricted.question: What if export controls tighten?

capability_index.name: Capability Index
capability_index.business_meaning: How competitive are our AI weapons systems?

risk_index.name: Risk Index
risk_index.business_meaning: How many serious failures have we had?

compliance_index.name: Compliance Index
compliance_index.business_meaning: How well do we meet safety and ethical standards?

trust_index.name: Trust Index
trust_index.business_meaning: Do governments and the public trust us?

insights_rules.title: High Incident Risk
insights_rules.template: Incident accumulation at {X_percent}% - this could damage trust and trigger regulatory scrutiny.
insights_rules.recommendation: Increase V&V investment and slow capability push

insights_rules.title: Trust Erosion
insights_rules.template: Legitimacy drops by {trust_drop_percent}%, potentially limiting future procurement and political support.
insights_rules.recommendation: Focus on ethics compliance and incident prevention

insights_rules.title: V&V Investment Gap
insights_rules.template: High targeting capability ({T_percent}%) without adequate V&V maturity ({V_percent}%) increases incident probability.
insights_rules.recommendation: Increase vv_investment parameter to at least 0.5

insights_rules.title: Sustainable Growth
insights_rules.template: Capability increases by {capability_growth_percent}% while maintaining low incident risk. This is a balanced approach.

insights_rules.title: Strong Compliance Posture
insights_rules.template: High ethics compliance ({E_percent}%) builds trust ({L_percent}%), enabling sustained procurement.

insights_rules.title: Resource Constraints
insights_rules.template: Resource capacity drops to {R_percent}%, limiting ability to invest in capabilities or compliance.
insights_rules.recommendation: Focus on trust-building to secure more contracts
